data.azimuth: Azimuth (360 degrees, 0 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, 270 = West)
data.damping_morning: Damping factor: adjusts the results in the morning
data.damping_evening: Damping factor: adjusts the results in the evening
data.efficiency_factor: DC efficiency factor (0.0-1.0, 0.0 = 100% loss, 1.0 = no loss)
data.modules_power: Total Watt peak power of your solar modules
data.inverter_power: The capacity of your inverter in Watt
data.name: Name

user.description: Fill in the data of your solar panels. Please refer to the documentation if a field is unclear.

energy_production_d7.name: Estimated energy production - 7 days from now
